resources.string: Use DUO carpooling mode when riding \nwith friends, family, and co-workers and \nEVERYONE gets rewarded.

DUO for Drivers

DUO mode is used by passengers only. As drivers, simply use Metropia as you normally would.

Ask your passenger to start Metropia in DUO mode.

You do the driving and leave the rest up to us.

We’ll figure out who you’re riding with and give you bonus points for each DUO passenger.

DUO for Passengers

Using DUO couldn’t be easier.

When you leave twith a driver, simply tap Start My Trip.

As long as your driver is using Metropia to help you to your destination we’ll pair you automatically.

When your reach your destination - you guessed it - tap End my Trip.

Your driver gets bonus points and you get to spin our prize wheel.

Want to learn more? Check out our DUO FAQ.
